Articles.Content: Can some one please make a auto mission generator that generates the launch trajectory numbers required and Hoffman transfer trajectory for both planets and moons that i can use along side Mechjeb?The reason for this mod request is because i just like to build and fly rockets and planes and see if i can reach a planet or moon or another star system i just want a easy less complex mission planner and i also want it to automatically calculate the required Delta v to my selected destination and i am not a hardcore type for simulators but just like building and flying and exploring and i would appreciate a mod like this?

It's a web app, not a mod, but see Where Can I Go?

You can also just print out one of the delta-V maps from http://kerbalproof.com

I particularly like this one because it already added up all the numbers:
